overview: Savanna Samson is on vacation with her best girlfriend and their two teenage sons. Seeing their young studs hitting on a couple of college girls gets them hornier than hell. So one night, Savanna pays a visit to her son`s friend`s bedroom and shows him the advantages of a MILF over a teen. And then there were three... AVN`s most awarded director, Paul Thomas presents a tale of familial perversion, rather than the familiar perversions you might be more used to. With porn`s most perverted bad girl, Savanna Samson, and a strong runner-up, beautiful new Vivid star Megan Mallone, this is truly about the family that plays together and stays together.
title: Blame It on Savanna
